fields.subject: Best wax for wooden wicks
fields.message: One of my favorite waxes to use is the 464 soy wax!

fields.subject: How many wicks are too many?
fields.message: I like two but I really want to use three now!

fields.subject: The best scents to mix
fields.message: Definitely anything with vanilla because it's very light!

fields.subject: Dye blocks vs liquid dye
fields.message: If you're using soy definitely liquid!
